secondary.description: Gold for Ornamental Stones badge and premium accents

buttons.primary: bg-[#1E3A8A] text-white hover:bg-[#172554] rounded-sm px-8 py-4 uppercase tracking-wider font-medium transition-all duration-300 hover:shadow-lg
buttons.secondary: border border-[#1E3A8A] text-[#1E3A8A] hover:bg-[#1E3A8A] hover:text-white rounded-sm px-8 py-4 uppercase tracking-wider font-medium transition-all duration-300
buttons.ghost: text-slate-600 hover:text-[#1E3A8A] hover:bg-slate-50 rounded-sm px-4 py-2 transition-colors

cards.feature: bg-white p-8 border border-slate-100 hover:border-[#1E3A8A]/20 hover:shadow-xl transition-all duration-500 group
cards.bento_item: relative overflow-hidden bg-slate-50 group hover:shadow-2xl transition-all duration-500 border border-slate-200

badges.gold: bg-[#D4AF37] text-white px-3 py-1 text-xs font-bold uppercase tracking-widest rounded-sm shadow-md

dashboard_guidelines.layout: Sidebar navigation (fixed left) + Main Content Area
dashboard_guidelines.style: Clean, white cards, minimal borders, high data density
dashboard_guidelines.charts: Recharts with custom tooltips, minimal grid lines
dashboard_guidelines.tables: Shadcn Table component, striped rows optional, sticky header

universal_guidelines: Use 'Oswald' for all headings to convey industrial strength.
Use 'Inter' for body text for maximum readability.
Primary Blue (#1E3A8A) is for primary actions and branding.
Gold (#D4AF37) is EXCLUSIVELY for the 'Ornamental Stones' highlight and premium accents.
Avoid rounded corners > 4px. Keep it sharp and professional.
All images must have a subtle overlay (bg-black/10) when text is placed over them.
Dashboard must be clean: White backgrounds, slate-500 text for labels, slate-900 for values.
